descript.abstract: Hotel location including the facilities included at each hotel in St Vincent and The Grenadines. Attribute table includes the number beds, the number of rooms, whether the hotel is on the water, if A/C is available. The number of beds has not been completely filled out because this information isn't readily available. This will be designated as a value of "-9999" in the attribute table. Attribute table data was obtained from the St Vincent and The Grenadines, Ministry of Tourism 2010 accommodation digest
descript.purpose: Developed to locate and understand the capacity of the tourism industry in St Vincent and The Grenadines. This information will help inform the Nature Conservancy's AWE project. Scientists around the world agree that climate change is indisputable. Impacts, including rising sea levels, increased storm intensity, warming temperatures and acidifying waters, dying coral reefs, shifting fish stocks, and incidence of flooding and drought, are already being felt, and are expected to continue and increase for decades to come. Nature holds some of the world’s best and most practical solutions to climate change, solutions that keep nature and people healthy, safe, and secure. The goal of At the Water’s Edge (AWE) is to demonstrate that governments and people in vulnerable coastal communities in Grenada and St. Vincent and the Grenadines (SVG) can enhance their resilience to climate change by protecting, restoring and effectively managing their marine and coastal ecosystems (also known as ecosystem-based adaptation or EBA) and strengthening local capacity for adaptation.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Country Code 2 - 4 digit country identifier, same as calling code
Census Division Code - Unique 2 digit CD identifier
Unique census division identifier consisting of 4 digit country code, and 2 digit CD Code
Name of island where feature is located
Designates a type to each feature. Specifies whether the feature is a regular hotel building, villa, cottage, apartment or guest house.
Number of beds at each feature.
Number of rooms at each feature.
Specifies whether the hotel is beachfront (coded as 1) or not (coded as 0).
Specifies whether the hotel has A/C (coded as 1) or not (coded as 0).
Specifies whether the hotel has a pool (coded as 1) or not (coded as 0).
Specifies whether the hotel has tennis courts (coded as 1) or not (coded as 0).
Specifies whether the hotel offers water sporting activities on the property (coded as 1) or not (coded as 0).
